Articles.Content:
I was wondering if we could get some regular wheel part for rovers, roughly around the same time you get the first airplane parts. Perhaps even an engine so it doesn't have to rely on high tech fuel cells?

I'm aware that mods offer more variety wheels, but I don't see why this can't be part of the official game regardless. You can make airplaines before you can make spaceplanes, why not allow people to make land rovers before they can make mun rovers? It's good practice for later. Plus there is good science early on to grab all over Kerbin. It'd be nice not to have to rely on airplane wheels for offroad driving. Edited November 17, 2015 by Tricky14
Yes.  I usually build a rover with aircraft landing gear and a jet engine for propulsion to grab some early science.  Pretty sure we should have self-propelled ground vehicles before jet aircraft.

It would be cool to have a power supply that creates EC using Liquid Fuel and Intake Air that we could use to power our early Kerbin only rovers that we can use around the KSC, and some regular type tires.

 

Plz?
